name: nomage
description: node-image stuff without using native dependencies, inspired by jimp

scripts.test: npm run build && NODE_ENV=test-no-cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --require babel-polyfill --compilers js:babel-core/register --timeout 20000
scripts.test-cover: npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/babel-node ./node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover --report html ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --require babel-polyfill --timeout 60000

author: justnewbee@gmail.com
